page.title: 04EDUCATION/SCHOOLS
page.content: There are 5 primary schools in our area.They are: Frogwell J.I. (N.O.R. 370) Ivy Lane J.I. (N.O.R. 420) Redlands J.I. (N.O.R. 160) St. Mary's R.C. J.I. (N.O.R. 210) St. Peter's C of E J.I. (N.O.R. 140) These schools represent the majority of primary school provision in Chippenham.Together with many village schools they help to fill two comprehensive schools also located in Chippenham.Children leave primary school aged 11. There is a small unit for special education based at Frogwell School. With the exception of Ivy Lane the schools are housed in modern or recently renovated buildings. The L.E.A. is Wiltshire C.C.,County Hall,Trowbridge,Wilts.
